profile.summary: Passionate, responsible and committed engineer, with a get-it-done, on-time spirit, and more than 10years of experience in designing, implementing and adapting software technologies as full-stacksoftware engineer, have sound knowledge of Object Oriented Programming and MVC design pattern, with specializingin both frontend and back-end like HTML, CSS, JavaScript, Twitter Bootstrap, jQuery, Ajax, Gulp, SASS, Jekyll, D3, High charts, BEM CSS Framework and MVC JS frameworks as Angularand ReactJS moreover inback-end Laravel 5, Code Igniter, Yii and ExpressJS Frameworks in LAMP and MEAN stacks respectively. In database have experience with MYSQL 5, PostgreSQL, Mongo dB, Microsoft SQL Server 2008 and Vertica.
